name: Glass Wars (itch)
description:
This game is a first-person shooter. In the future it is planned to add:

1) at least 1 new type of weapon

2) a full-fledged city

3) random  map generation

4) physics of breaking things

5) and much more

The game was made in less than 24 hours. If you like the game, please rate it so that I can understand whether it is worth continuing to develop it.

Thank you for your attention to my project)
